name: Gold Pusher
description:
Gold Pusher is a game made in Unreal Engine 4 for Ludum Dare 40!

The theme of the jam is "The more you have, the worse it is"

The game has multiple modes -- from trying to simply knock as many coins free as possible, to trying to balance as many coins on the board without letting any fall as possible.

(1.1 Release contains enhanced title screen and a few small bugfixes, plus I trimmed a lot of the fat to get the filesize down, updated at 12:44am 12/5/2017. Keep that in mind for any voting purposes)
